## Basic Info.

-   Name: Waldseemüller's 1507 World Map

    -   *Universalis Cosmographia*

-   Who: 마르틴 발트제뮐러 Martin Waldseemüller (1470 – 16 March 1520)

-   When: 1507

-   Where: [Library of Congress](https://www.loc.gov/), Washington D.C., U.S.

-   Size: 1.28 x 2.33 M [@brotton2014b, 86]
